properties.areaDesc: Keweenaw; Gogebic; Ontonagon; Houghton; Southern Houghton; Baraga
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 4:00AM EST until January 8 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow expected. The
heaviest snow will occur this evening. Total snow accumulations
will range from 3 to 9 inches, greatest from just north of
Ironwood to the Porcupine Mountains and then to the high terrain
of the Keweenaw Peninsula. Northwest winds will gust to 25 as
35 mph, strongest over the Keweenaw Peninsula.

* WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan.

* WHEN...From 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ this morning to 9 AM EST /8
AM CST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult at times. Falling
snow combined with blowing snow will result in periods of
significantly reduced visibility and drifted snow on roads. The
hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute today and
the morning commute on Wednesday.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING TO 9 AM EST /8 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY
